MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the WA7 postcode area of Runcorn, affecting properties in Edward Street, Main Street and surrounding area.  This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:44AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.45PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:58AM on 1st February 2021
